title: Eco-Modern Duplex with Garden & Smart Home in Historic Dyrekcja
description: This beautifully designed duplex features four comfortable bedrooms and three modern bathrooms, blending eco-focused materials with stylish architecture. The spacious living area opens with patio doors onto a lush garden, complemented by a bright dining area ideal for gatherings. State-of-the-art smart home technology, an elegant balcony, and a charming outdoor dining zone enhance both comfort and convenience, while a welcoming reception area provides a sleek entry point. Designed for natural light and connection to nature, the home offers a balanced atmosphere for relaxing and working alike.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Chelm’s Dyrekcja neighborhood—famed for its historic charm—the area boasts quaint boutiques, local dining, and a tranquil, cultural vibe. While enjoying a peaceful environment with a lower urban footprint, residents have practical access to main highways only minutes away, ensuring quick travel beyond the city. Nearby shops and restaurants support everyday needs while providing unique flavors of modern Polish living.
lifestyle_benefits: integration of indoor and outdoor living
quiet borrowing from history and culture nearby
space tailored for remote or hybrid working
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious professionals or families relocating for work in Chelm, seeking a modern, tech-equipped haven with convenient road links and relaxing green space.
market_positioning: Positioned as a leading-edge, eco-friendly family duplex in Dyrekcja’s charming, historic setting—this property stands out for modern amenities, passive design, and its value within the upper mid-range Chelm market, especially for buyers from larger Polish cities aiming for sustainable living without urban density.
